name: @appik-studio/expo-parsely
description: Enhanced Parse.ly Analytics SDK for React Native and Expo - comprehensive engagement tracking, heartbeat monitoring, and cross-platform analytics

scripts.release:patch: yarn bump:patch && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release patch version" && git push
scripts.release:minor: yarn bump:minor && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release minor version" && git push
scripts.release:major: yarn bump:major && git add . && git commit -m "chore: release major version" && git push
scripts.ios:refresh: yarn build ; cd example && yarn expo:prebuild-clean-ios && yarn ios:pod-install && yarn ios
scripts.android:refresh: yarn build ; cd example && yarn expo:prebuild-clean-android && yarn android

author: Livio Gamassia <livio@appik-studio.ch> (Appik-Studio)
